abstract: Gen Carlos Eugenio Vides Casanova, former defense minister of El Salvador accused of human rights violations during 1980s civil war, is detained by immigration agents in Palm Coast, Fla, first step in his deportation.
lead_paragraph: A former defense minister of El Salvador accused of human rights violations during the civil war in the 1980s was detained by immigration agents in Palm Coast, the first step in his deportation.

headline.main: Florida: Ex-Salvadoran Official Is Detained Pending Deportation
headline.print_headline: Florida: Ex-Salvadoran Official Is Detained Pending Deportation
